exceptions.exn: In environment V : Type labF : V -> [ordType of nat] f : depmap labF Unable to unify "f" with "f \\+ {| dmap := Unit; pf := dmDom_unit labF |}".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: Type
labF: V -> [ordType of nat]
f: depmap labF

Goal:
unit \+ f = f

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation ordType := Ordered.type
depmap : forall V : Type, (V -> Label) -> Type
Notation unit := (DepMaps.unit labF)
last_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V), PCM.Exports.valid f -> last_key (f \+ fresh f \\-> v) = fresh f
last_key_dom : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), PCM.Exports.valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
dom_last_key : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), PCM.Exports.valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f
dom_ordfresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x < fresh f
last_key_max : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x <= last_key f
onPhantom : forall (P : ?T -> Prop) (x : ?T), phantom Prop (P x) where ?T : [V : Type labF : V -> [ordType of nat] f : depmap labF |- Type]
valid_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V), PCM.Exports.valid (f \+ fresh f \\-> v) = PCM.Exports.valid f
max_key_last : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> {in dom f, forall y : nat, y <= x} -> last_key f = x
dom_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), fresh f \notin dom f
dom_freshn : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (n : nat), fresh f + n \notin dom f
fresh : forall V : Type, union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat
last_key : forall V : Type, union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat
valid_fresh' : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V) (i : [ordType of nat]) (w : V), PCM.Exports.valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> PCM.Exports.valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)
join : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> Label), depmap labF -> depmap labF -> depmap labF
last_keyfUn : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), PCM.Exports.valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f1 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
last_keyUnf : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), PCM.Exports.valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f2 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
dmap : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> Label), depmap labF -> union_map Label V
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
joinA : forall f1 f2 f3 : depmap labF, f1 \+ (f2 \+ f3) = f1 \+ f2 \+ f3
joinCA : forall f1 f2 f3 : depmap labF, f1 \+ (f2 \+ f3) = f2 \+ (f1 \+ f3)
validL : forall f1 f2 : depmap labF, valid (f1 \+ f2) -> valid f1
valid : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> Label), depmap labF -> bool
joinC : forall f1 f2 : depmap labF, f1 \+ f2 = f2 \+ f1
DepMaps.unit : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> Label), depmap labF
join_undefR : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f : U), f \+ um_undef = um_undef
join_undefL : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f : U), um_undef \+ f = um_undef
Inductive unit : Set := tt : Datatypes.unit
DepMap : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> Label) (dmap : union_map Label V), dmDom labF dmap -> depmap labF
pf : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> Label) (d : depmap labF), dmDom labF (dmap d)
umPtUE : forall (K : ordType) (V : eqType) (k : K) (v : V) (f : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC K V)), (k \\-> v \+ f == Unit) = false

```coq
unfold unit, DepMaps.unit. rewrite joinC. reflexivity.
Qed.```
